snippet: KRANTZ--Bertram. Devoted husband of Eda. Loving father of Andrea Krantz and Harvey Sawikin; Melissa Krantz and Greg Katz; and Jay Krantz and Yuka Katsuki Krantz. Proud grandfather of Leo and William; Sadie and Sara. Funeral at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue, on Sunday, January 31 at 3pm. 1/3
